name: Lorena and the Land of Ruins ~ Guns and Magical Treasure Hunters ~
name_original: Lorena and the Land of Ruins ~ Guns and Magical Treasure Hunters ~
description:
TPS (3D third person shooter) where a girl shoots a gun in a fantasy world.
We will explore the depths of the ruins left by the ancient scientific civilization while rejecting the enemies that are rushing in one after another.
